bio: I am a full stack Java developer with 10+ years of experience in software development. I have a Master of Science in Computer Science from Maharishi International University, a Master of Science in Computer Science and Networking from the University of Pisa, and a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and a Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration and Information Systems from Addis Ababa University. I have experience in Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Spring, React, Angular, Django, Restjs, Oracle, MySQL, AWS, and GCP. I have worked as a Software Developer at the Ethiopian Revenues and Customs Authority, the Development Bank of Ethiopia, and NTT DATA, and as a Software Engineer at Walmart Global Tech. I am currently seeking a full-time position as a Software Engineer. I am a hard worker, a team player, and a quick learner. I am passionate about software development and I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills.
name: TESFAMICHAEL ADUGNA
